title: Open System - Client API Application Generate
description: Generate Web API application project code and Data Contracts based on an OpenApi spec

generator.description: The OpenAPITools generator you want to use

sourceRoot.description: The path of the project relative to the workspace root.

projectName.description: The name to use for the project in the Nx workspace.

domainName.description: The name of the domain to generate these files for.

specJsonFile.description: The path (relative to the workspace root) where the OpenAPI JSON spec file is located
